scripts.build:services-icons: rm -rf src/components/services-icons && svgr -d src/components/services-icons svgs/inherit/services --config-file templates/.svgrrc.js
scripts.build:file-icons: rm -rf src/components/files-icons && svgr -d src/components/files-icons svgs/inherit/files --config-file templates/.svgrrc.js
scripts.build:display-icons: rm -rf src/components/display-icons && svgr -d src/components/display-icons svgs/inherit/display --config-file templates/.svgrrc.js
scripts.build:interface-icons: rm -rf src/components/interface-icons && svgr -d src/components/interface-icons svgs/inherit/interface --config-file templates/.svgrrc.js
scripts.build:logo-icons: rm -rf src/components/logo-icons && svgr --config-file templates/.svgrrc-color.js -d src/components/logo-icons svgs/color/logos
scripts.build:color-icons: rm -rf src/components/color-icons && svgr --config-file templates/.svgrrc-color.js -d src/components/color-icons svgs/color/other
scripts.build:svgs-color: npm run build:color-icons && npm run build:logo-icons
scripts.build:svgs-inherit: npm run build:file-icons && npm run build:services-icons && npm run build:display-icons && npm run build:interface-icons
scripts.compile: npm run build:svgs-inherit && npm run build:svgs-color
